title: didn't  receive My 4 ip boost when i verify it
body: Changed my email twice and still no ip boost? i verified them twice aswell :p

replies.body: It can take about a day for the boost to be added to the account.  Hang tight, but if it takes longer than that then his us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to take a look directly and see what the deal is.
